email.subject: Bulk warranty claim - AirFlow Basic units failing
email.body:
We purchased 5 AirFlow Basic dryers for our salon on December 18.
After heavy daily use on clients, 3 of them have stopped working.

Serials: HD-001-483921, HD-001-483922, HD-001-483923

We need replacements ASAP for our business.

Beauty Salon Inc.
100 Salon Street
Miami, FL 33101
